Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Labo abenza iQurâ€™an ukuthi ibe izingxenye
Ngakho-ke ngifunga ngeNkosi yakho! Siyobabuza bonke ndawonye
Ngakho-ke	memezela	ngokusobala	ngalokho	ophoqwe ngakho futhi uqhelelane nabakhonzi bezithixo
Ngempela thina sikwenele ukubhekana nabenza inhlekisa
Labo abenza omunye unkulunkulu (isithixo) basihlanganise noMvelinqangi ngakho-ke bayokwazi
Futhi ngempela siyazi ukuthi wena siyacinana isifuba sakho ngenxa yalokho abakushoyo
Ngakho-ke dumisa udumo lweNkosi yakho futhi ube ngomunye wabazithobayo
Futhi khonza iNkosi yakho kuze kube ufikelwe isiqiniseko (ukufa)
Impoqo ka-Mvelinqangi iyeza ngakho-ke ungayijahi udumo malube kuye nokuphakanyiswa ngaphezu kwalokho abakwenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni
Uthumela phansi izingelosi nesambulo ngempoqo yakhe kunoma ngabe ubani amthandayo ezincekwini zakhe ukuze zexwaye ukuthi akunanto enokukhonzwa ngaphandle kwami (uMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke ngesabeni
Wadala amazulunomhlabangeqiniso, ungaphezukwakokonke lokho abamenzela ngakho abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni
Wadala umuntu ngeconsi lesidoda elihlangene nokuphuma kwesifazane kepha (lowo muntu) nguyena oyisitha esigqamile
Nezinkomo wazidalela nina, kuzona kunemfudumalo (izembatho ezifudumele) kanye nenzuzo futhi niyayidla inyama yazo
Futhi kunobuhle kunina ngenkathi niziqhuba (nibuya nazo) nangenkathi nizikhiphela (emadlelweni azo)
